name: Lost Action Hero
description:
Meet the best blockbuster from 1989 - Lost Action Hero!..

WHAT?! You oveslept your film shooting?
Hurry up and run to studio and try to find your film set before producer become totally mad !

Shoot at everything, search hidden places, collect all Shmoscars statuettes.
Run through the deadly labyrinths of the movie studio and try not to die - no insurance included!
Become a true Cowboy and make a best movie ever!


Features:

● Simple but challenging gameplay, inspired by classic NES platformer games
● Trust no one, but your gun. Shoot at everything if it looks dangerous or suspicious.
● Easter eggs..? Many of them! Can you find out all references?
● Neat and nice pixel art
● Sweet and dazzling OST by Ozzed
